name: coil
effect: Raises the user’s Attack, Defense, and accuracy by one stage each.
short_effect: Raises the user’s Attack, Defense, and accuracy by one stage each.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.
